attributes.additional_details: To stop the building of a waste incinerator in Castleford......They are a health and safety risk to the local community and the environment. This one is being built adjacent to a green area where kids play and people walk their dogs. It is less than half a mile from 3 local schools and aprox 100 yards from local housing where around 1500 people could be affected....There is a Nature reserve about 2 miles away as the crow flies or the wind blows and it will operate 24 hrs 7 days per week producing and storing Methane Gas
